alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:26PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflows will impact portions of south central Weber...northwestern Salt Lake...eastern Davis...southwestern Morgan and western Summit Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 826 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Farmington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Ogden, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Morgan, Hill Air Force Base, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, South Ogden, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, South Weber, West Bountiful, Uintah, Salt Lake City International Airport, Fruit Heights and Huntsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 313 and 335. Interstate 84 between mile markers 85 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
